name: Michael Qualey
coverLetter:
I've only trimmed one season, and also helped build grows ,helped with harvesting , pruning , deleafing ,transplanting ,hanging an drying large quantities of plants. 
I would need to pitch a tent I do not have my own vehicle. Im will to negotiate work time frame. The most I can trim has been half a pound at least a day outdoor/indoor. No crows feet or brown leaves. Good at bucking down too. Can work in all weather conditions.
